Translations.Text: Yi wuhuaguo he ganlan guo mengshi
yi xinai shan mengshi
yi zhege anning de chengshi mengshi
wo que yi ba ren zaocheng juyou zuimei de xingtai
ranhou, wo shi ta bian cheng zui beilie de
dan xindao erqie xing shan zhe, jiang shou buduan de baochou
cihou, ni zenme hai fouren baoying ne
Nandao an la bushi zui gongdao de panjue zhe ma
Ni yingdang feng ni de chuangzao zhu de mingyi er xuandu
ta ceng yong xiekuai chuangzao ren
Ni yingdang xuandu, ni de zhu shi zui zunyan de
ta ceng jiao ren yong bi xiezi
ta ceng jiao ren zhidao ziji suo bu zhidao de dongxi
Jue buran, ren que shi beini de
yinwei ta renwei ziji shi wu qiu de
Wanwu biding zhi guiyu ni de zhu
Ni gaosu wo ba
Nage jinzhi wo de puren libai de ren
ni gaosu wo ba! Ruguo ta shi zunxun zhengdao de
huo shi ming ren jingwei de
Ni gaosu wo ba! Ruguo ta shi fouren zhenli de, beiqi zhenli de
nandao ta hai bu zhidao an la shi jiancha de ma
Jue buran, ruguo ta bu tingzhi, wo yiding yao zhua zhu ta de e fa——
shuohuang zhe, fanzui zhe de e fa
Rang ta qu zhaoji ta de huizhong ba
Wo jiang zhaoji zai ba ni tianshi
jue buran, ni buyao shuncong ta, ni yingdang wei an la er koutou, ni yingdang qinjin an la
